message.name: ERR_COMM_DATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: The date for this communication must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_COMM_DATE_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply a from date for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_EMAIL_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: %1s has no email address and cannot receive email communications. You must supply an email address.

message.name: ERR_COMM_NAME_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply a correspondent name for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_PHONE_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must provide the phone number for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_PROFORMA_TYPE_BLANK
message.locale: You must select a pro forma type for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_SUBJECT_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply a subject for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_TEXT_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply freeform text for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_FAX_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must provide the fax number for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_NO_SENDER_EMAIL
message.locale: To send an email the senders email address must be specified. At the moment neither the current User or the organization has a valid email address that can be used as the senders email. Please update one of these email addresses before trying to send this email. Note that in the case of the User it is the business email address that is used and not the personal email address.

To send an email the senders email address must be specified. At the moment neither the current User or the organisation has a valid email address that can be used as the senders email. Please update one of these email addresses before trying to send this email. Note that in the case of the User it is the business email address that is used and not the personal email address.

message.name: ERR_COMM_METHOD_PHONE_NEED_TYPECODE_BLANK
message.locale: No communication type exists for method type phone. Please reset the communication type to blank.

message.name: ERR_COMM_TYPE_CODE_BLANK
message.locale: You must select a communication type for this method of communication
